channel.title: Printers on icyphox
channel.description: Recent content in Printers on icyphox

item.title: Hacking printers for fun and profit
item.description: I usually frequent this website/blog called n0where.net. They’ve got some really unique tools and utilities that pertain to pentesting or forensics. So that’s where I found PRET. The PRinter Exploitation Toolkit This tool was developed mainly to ease the whole process of attacking a printer. Seriously, who woulda thunk you could even hack a printer? Anyway, before we delve in, here’s a bit of background on the whole subject. Essentially, prnters are configured and interacted with, by using a printer language.
